name: Verse
headline: Social network based on who you are, not what you look like
description: Verse is one of the fastest platforms ever to reach over 10 million users. We're building a home on the internet for Gen Z to showcase their identity and keep up with their friends in novel and creative ways.
tags: industry:consumer; industry:entertainment; industry:social; industry:music; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Bobby Pinckney, Founder
founders.description:
Bobby is the co-founder and CEO of multiple consumer apps including Verse, one of the fastest social platforms of all time to reach over 10M users, and Discz, which Rolling Stone called "one of the hottest music apps in the world."

He is a Forbes 30 under 30 lister, Y Combinator alumni, and his ventures have been backed by multiple of the top venture capital firms.

founders.name: Michelle Yin, Founder
founders.description: Michelle is the co-founder and CTO of Verse. She also started Discz, a music platform with over 1.5M users which Rolling Stone called "one of the hottest in the world". Previously, she was a senior engineer at Meta working on zero to one initiatives at NPE, and WhatsApp.

generated_description:
**Verse: Social Networking Reimagined for Gen Z**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Verse quickly established itself as a powerful new player in the social networking space, attracting over 10 million users in record time. Based in New York with a small team of just five employees, Verse is on a mission to create a social network based on who you are, rather than what you look like. This fresh perspective aligns perfectly with the values of Gen Z, offering them a platform where identity and personal expression take center stage.

So, what does Verse actually do? It allows users to create vibrant and visually engaging content—think blogs, mini-sites, collages, and mixed media art. The emphasis is on creativity and self-expression rather than traditional social metrics. Users can craft their "internet bedroom," which reflects their musical tastes and personal style, making it a unique digital space that goes beyond mere text and images.

Their development is powered by the compelling idea that everyone should have a place on the internet that feels truly theirs. By connecting with platforms like Apple Music, Verse enables users to showcase their identities in novel ways. It's not just a social app; it's a canvas for creativity and community.

To get started with Verse, you can visit their website at [madeonverse.com](https://madeonverse.com/) or check out their app to dive into your new digital home. As a blend of entertainment, creativity, and social interaction, Verse is not just redefining how we connect online; it's reimagining the very foundation of social networking for the new generation.
